Making a new Django project
===========================

1. Init a git repo
2. Add requirements.txt
 * Django>=1.5.1
 * Django-Require
 * Fabric
 * Links Devops
 * django-celery-with-redis
 * ipython
 * Pillow
 * sorl-thumbnail
 * South
 * Unipath
 * django-extensions
 * django-crispy-forms
 * PyYAML
 * psycopg2
 * Johnny Cache
 * Jimmy Page
3. Install requirements.txt
4. Start a django project
5. Add .gitignore
6. mkdir $app/settings
7. touch $app/settings/__init__.py
8. mv $app/settings.py -> $app/settings/base.py
9. Edit base.py (FUCK IT LETS USE A TEMPLATE)
 * add APP = '$app'
 * Setup timezone=Europe/London
